attributes.review: I tried to download this on the 4/20. It downloaded, BUT right after 69 days of using the app my whole phone blew up and my copy of the Gummy Bear Album got deleted. Which made me so mad that I had to scream the bite of 87. Disappointed man...just disappointed 🤡🤡
attributes.title: They deleted my Gummy Bear Album copy >:(

attributes.review: This app made my fish drown!😭 I can’t believe it, first of all it took 69 hours to download. It completely messed up my phone making the time constantly at 4:20 on April 20th. My phone also won’t charge higher than 69%.😤 Then I opened the app and it started barking at my fish!🐠🤯 My fish 🐟 was so scared 😱 it pooped so much it died!😡💀☠️. This app is an abomination 😡🤬 and should be taken down 👎
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP!

attributes.review: If I could rate this app as good as Trump’s presidency is going, one star would be generous.
attributes.title: FILLED MY PHONE WITH RUSSIAN BOTS

attributes.review: I honestly think trump is just a orange that came to life and has gone crazy😭💅🏽
attributes.title: This junk is booty just end your career

attributes.review: orange you glad i made this review.
tried to download the app, instead donald trump showed up to my house and curb stomped me then punted my baby into the sky. definitely do not recommend. worst experience ever.
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: They are Savages😳 this app has 10 ads per second, and they post bad and racist things regarding our fellow African Americans. 0/10, would not recommend. I’d rather Fox News than this foolery🤭
Nothing 👎 works ❌ on 🎯 this 🧃 app 🎂. It’s 🧚‍♀️ unfortunate 🤡 we 🌎 can’t 🙅 make 🍔 America 🇺🇸 great 🌈 again ✨.
attributes.title: horrible 🤢
